aboutThisUseCase.name: Develop a Multitenant Extension Application in SAP BTP, Kyma Runtime - Consumer Account creation
aboutThisUseCase.description: This project contains a reference application, showcasing an end-to-end development scenario for a multitenant extension on SAP BTP Kyma runtime, which has an SAP partner as focus persona.
aboutThisUseCase.author: alexander.rieder@sap.com
